languages.text: "Все так". {n}Мужчина слегка хлопает аугментированной ладонью по груди. Слышится удар металла о металл.{/n}
"So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Все так". {n}Мужчина слегка хлопает аугментированной ладонью по груди. Слышится удар металла о металл.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}

languages.text: “确实如此。”{n}阿吉里亚斯用他带着植入物的手捶打着自己的胸口，你听了到金属相撞发出的叮咚声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。”{n}阿吉里亚斯用他带着植入物的手捶打着自己的胸口，你听了到金属相撞发出的叮咚声。{/n}

languages.text: «Efectivamente». {n}Achilleas se golpea el pecho con su mano aumentada. Oyes el clamor de metal contra metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente». {n}Achilleas se golpea el pecho con su mano aumentada. Oyes el clamor de metal contra metal.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうですね」{n}アキレアスは義手で自分の胸をドンと叩く。金属同士がぶつかり合う音が聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうですね」{n}アキレアスは義手で自分の胸をドンと叩く。金属同士がぶつかり合う音が聞こえる。{/n}

languages.text: "So ist es." {n}Achilleas schlägt sich mit seiner augmentierten Hand gegen die Brust. Du hörst, wie Metall auf Metall trifft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So ist es." {n}Achilleas schlägt sich mit seiner augmentierten Hand gegen die Brust. Du hörst, wie Metall auf Metall trifft.{/n}

languages.text: « Qu'il en soit ainsi, » {n}conclut Achilleas en frappant sa poitrine de sa main augmentée. Vous entendez le bruit du métal contre du métal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'il en soit ainsi, » {n}conclut Achilleas en frappant sa poitrine de sa main augmentée. Vous entendez le bruit du métal contre du métal.{/n}

languages.text: "Sona ermeyecek." {n}Achilleas, ogmentli elini göğsüne koyuyor. Metalin metale çarpma sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So it does." {n}Achilleas thumps himself on the chest with his augmented hand. You hear the clanging of metal against metal.{/n}
